# canBecomeKey

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the window can become the key window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canBecomeKey: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. To indicate that the window can’t become the key window, override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindow/canBecomeKey] and return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Making windows key

- **isKeyWindow**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window is the key window.
- **makeKeyAndVisible()**: Shows the window and makes it the key window.
- **makeKey()**: Makes the window the key window.
- **becomeKey()**: Tells the window that it’s the key window.
- **resignKey()**: Tells the window that it’s no longer the key window.
